title: Dorei-ku The Animation
synopsis: Eager to know why her best friend’s boyfriend dumped her for a man, the headstrong Eiya Arakawa suggests a meeting with them. Gathered together at a café, Yuuga Oota agrees to answer Eiya’s questions only if she can correctly ascertain the relationship of a couple sitting across from them, which she does on her first attempt. Amazed by her astounding intellect and intuition, he invites her to a private meeting where he introduces her to the concept of Slave Control Method, or SCM, a retainer-like device that has the ability to turn people into slaves.
characters: ['Arakawa, Eiya', 'Katsushika, Julia', 'Chuuou, Ataru', 'Oota, Yuuga', 'Sumida, Zushioumaru', 'Edogawa, Ryuuou', 'Nakano, Taiju', 'Kita, Minami', 'Shinjuku, Seiya', 'Shinagawa, Zero']
